name: supa
description: This is the root package of Supa. It does't have its own dependencies. Its only purpose is to serve for shortcut commands, such as `npm install` to install all dependencies in client and core packages

scripts.preinstall: cd packages/client && npm install && cd ../core && npm install
scripts.dev: cd packages/client && npm run tauri dev
scripts.build: cd packages/client && npm run tauri build
scripts.postinstall:
echo "
Run 'npm run rules' to generate AI rules from your documentation"
